November 26, 2024 - The private label Mama Bear sells baby wipes, baby food, diaper pail refills and baby laundry detergent. In 2018, the brand began selling newborn through size six diapers, which were previously offered by the Amazon Elements private brand before their removal from the site in 2014.

t: AMAZON DROPS IN-HOUSE CLOTHING BRANDS AS IT DOUBLES DOWN ON AMAZON BASICS | CORD CUTTERS NEWS
s: August 10, 2023 - Amazon is streamlining its in-house fashion business as it doubles down on its Amazon Basics line. The online retail giant will eliminate 27 of its 30 clothing brands, which range from Daily Ritual to Goodthreads. The three surviving brands are Amazon Essentials, Amazon Collection and Amazon Aware, ...

t: HOW TO SET UP YOUR AMAZON BRAND STORE
s: June 9, 2023 - Amazon Brand Stores can be accessed through the product tab at advertising.amazon.com. Or by clicking on “Stores” on the horizontal menu in your Seller Central account and selecting “Manage Stores” from the drop-down menu.

t: AMAZON TO SHUT DOWN STITCH FIX COMPETITOR 'PRIME TRY BEFORE YOU BUY'
s: January 10, 2025 - Amazon is shutting down "Prime Try Before You Buy," a competitor to Stitch Fix that allowed Prime members to try out clothes, shoes and accessories and only pay for items they wanted to keep.

t: THE COST OF DOWNTIME AT THE WORLD'S BIGGEST ONLINE RETAILER | UPGUARD
s: January 8, 2025 - Amazon reported revenues of $107 billion in 2015, which comes out to $203,577 every minute in today's numbers, or a $2,646,501 price tag for the 13 minute episode of downtime. Expensive and brand damaging service interruptions don't have to bring your online business to a screeching halt.
